content: stitch repeat to end of row row 2 knit dropping wraps f round netting stitch row 1 *yo k2tog repeat to end knitting any extra stitches row 2-8 repeat row 1 g round mesh stitch row 1 & 2 knit row 3 *yo slip 1st knitwise k2 pass slipped stitch over psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row row 4 knit row 5 k2 *yo slip 1st knitwise k2 psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row row 6 knit row 7 k1 *yo slip 1st knitwise k2 psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row row 8 knit abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitches rs right side ws wrong side co cast on bobble bind off pm place marker k2tog knit two stitches together decrease psso pass slipped stitch over knitted stitches yo yarn over
